Stone Bones
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Library: Fan Fiction, Poetry, Birthday List, Links & Non-Fiction Archive: Filk Songs: Stone Bones
By Waddafxup 101 on Wednesday, February 21, 2007 - 03:32 pm:

I wake up in the morning
And I raise my weary head
I've got a human for a trainer
And the barn was last night's bed

I don't where I'm going
Only God knows where I've been
I'm a fighting monster
A battle lover
A candle in the wind

When your brought into this world
They say your born in discs
Well at least they gave me something
I didn't have to steal,only had to win

Well they tell me that I'm old
Yeah I'm an old man
I'm a Golem in your stable
What Cain was to Abel
Now monster kill me if you can

I'm going down in a blaze of glory!
Fight me now,but it's no use!
I'm going out in a blaze of glory!
Lord I never drew first
But I drew first blood
I'm no one's son
They call me Stone Bones

You ask me about my conscience
And I will offer you my soul
You ask if I've become a wise man
Well I'll ask if you'll die old

You ask me if I known love
And what it is like to battle in the rain
I've seen love come
And I've seen love go
I've seen it die in vain

Shot down in a blaze of glory!
Fight me now,but it's no use!
Cause I'm going down in blaze of glory!
Lord I've never drew first
But I've drew first blood
I'm no one's son
They call me Stone Bones

Each night I go to bed
I pray for one last win to be
No I ain't looking for a miracle
but before I retire in spring

Lord I got to ask a favor
And I hope you'll understand
Cause a lived life to the fullest
Let me die like a man

Starring at my opponent
Let me take my final stand!

Shot down in a blaze of glory!
Fight me now,but its no use!
I'm dying now in a blaze of glory
Lord I've never drew first
But I've drew first blood
I'm no one's son
They call me Stone Bones

My name is Stone Bones

By Lisa Shock on Thursday, February 22, 2007 - 06:27 am:

By alphamone on Thursday, February 22, 2007 - 12:33 pm:

WOW. that song is very deep and meaningful. I wish that I could be that expressive, but I have always had trouble getting all my good ideas out.

that must have taken a long time to write. I give you lots of praise.
